item.title: Antony panel report lists out reasons for LS poll rout
item.description: The fourmember panel headed by former defence minister AK Antony was set up by Congress chief Sonia Gandhi soon after the party slumped to its worstever Lok Sabha tally of 44 seats
item.itunes:subtitle: The fourmember panel headed by former defence minister AK Antony was set up by Congress chief Sonia Gandhi soon after the party slumped to its worstever Lok Sabha tally of 44 seats
item.itunes:summary: The fourmember panel headed by former defence minister AK Antony was set up by Congress chief Sonia Gandhi soon after the party slumped to its worstever Lok Sabha tally of 44 seats

item.title: Trouble brews on Bangladesh border BJP sounds war bugle
item.description: A lot has changed in Bengal Activities of Muslim fundamentalistnbspgroups mainly of the Bangladeshi variety and the Trinamool governments nonaction have led to the BJPs rise in the state
item.itunes:subtitle: A lot has changed in Bengal Activities of Muslim fundamentalistnbspgroups mainly of the Bangladeshi variety and the Trinamool governments nonaction have led to the BJPs rise in the state
item.itunes:summary: A lot has changed in Bengal Activities of Muslim fundamentalistnbspgroups mainly of the Bangladeshi variety and the Trinamool governments nonaction have led to the BJPs rise in the state

item.title: BJP chief Amit Shahs new team shows strong RSS presence Varun dropped
item.description: Gearing up for future elections BJP president Amit Shah on Saturday unveiled his new team that includes some fresh faces has a strong RSS presence and has dropped among others Varun Gandhi
item.itunes:subtitle: Gearing up for future elections BJP president Amit Shah on Saturday unveiled his new team that includes some fresh faces has a strong RSS presence and has dropped among others Varun Gandhi
item.itunes:summary: Gearing up for future elections BJP president Amit Shah on Saturday unveiled his new team that includes some fresh faces has a strong RSS presence and has dropped among others Varun Gandhi

item.title: Saradha scam CBI arrests exyouth Cong leader
item.description: The Central Bureau of Investigation CBI on Saturday arrested a former Youth Congress leader and carried out searches at 60 locations as part of its probe against the Artha Tatwa Group ATG that was named as an accused in the Saradha chitfund scam cases lodged by the agency
item.itunes:subtitle: The Central Bureau of Investigation CBI on Saturday arrested a former Youth Congress leader and carried out searches at 60 locations as part of its probe against the Artha Tatwa Group ATG that was named as an accused in the Saradha chitfund scam cases lod
item.itunes:summary: The Central Bureau of Investigation CBI on Saturday arrested a former Youth Congress leader and carried out searches at 60 locations as part of its probe against the Artha Tatwa Group ATG that was named as an accused in the Saradha chitfund scam cases lodged by the agency

item.title: Delhi Maid hangs self makes son witness act
item.description: A 23yearold woman who was employed as a help at an Indian Army officials south Delhi residence allegedly committed suicide in front of her two children following an altercation with her husband late on Friday evening
item.itunes:subtitle: A 23yearold woman who was employed as a help at an Indian Army officials south Delhi residence allegedly committed suicide in front of her two children following an altercation with her husband late on Friday evening
item.itunes:summary: A 23yearold woman who was employed as a help at an Indian Army officials south Delhi residence allegedly committed suicide in front of her two children following an altercation with her husband late on Friday evening

item.title: West Bengal TMC leader shot dead
item.description: A Trinamool Congress leader was shot dead by unidentified men late on saturday nightnbspin West Bengals Birbhum district
item.itunes:subtitle: A Trinamool Congress leader was shot dead by unidentified men late on saturday nightnbspin West Bengals Birbhum district
item.itunes:summary: A Trinamool Congress leader was shot dead by unidentified men late on saturday nightnbspin West Bengals Birbhum district

item.title: Dead beat journalists struggle to get scoops from PMs office
item.description: The PMOs communication strategy of opting for social media over conventional works well when the times are good but it may not be the best mechanism in times of crisis
item.itunes:subtitle: The PMOs communication strategy of opting for social media over conventional works well when the times are good but it may not be the best mechanism in times of crisis
item.itunes:summary: The PMOs communication strategy of opting for social media over conventional works well when the times are good but it may not be the best mechanism in times of crisis

item.title: Gujarat professor held in obscene letter case refused bail
item.description: A local court in Ahmedabad on Saturday rejected the bail plea of a Gujarat University professor arrested on charges of sexually harassing his women colleagues saying prima facie he had committed an obscene act
item.itunes:subtitle: A local court in Ahmedabad on Saturday rejected the bail plea of a Gujarat University professor arrested on charges of sexually harassing his women colleagues saying prima facie he had committed an obscene act
item.itunes:summary: A local court in Ahmedabad on Saturday rejected the bail plea of a Gujarat University professor arrested on charges of sexually harassing his women colleagues saying prima facie he had committed an obscene act

item.title: Nine arrested in Kanpur food poisoning incident
item.description: Nine people have been arrested in connection with food poisoning which affected 154 children and 20 adults after they ate sweets distributed at functions to mark the occasion of Independence Day
item.itunes:subtitle: Nine people have been arrested in connection with food poisoning which affected 154 children and 20 adults after they ate sweets distributed at functions to mark the occasion of Independence Day
item.itunes:summary: Nine people have been arrested in connection with food poisoning which affected 154 children and 20 adults after they ate sweets distributed at functions to mark the occasion of Independence Day

item.title: Modi pushes for selfreliance in weaponry
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi stressed the need for selfreliance in manufacturing defence equipment while commissioning INS Kolkata Indias largest indigenous built warship at the Naval Dockyard on Saturday
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modi stressed the need for selfreliance in manufacturing defence equipment while commissioning INS Kolkata Indias largest indigenous built warship at the Naval Dockyard on Saturday
item.itunes:summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi stressed the need for selfreliance in manufacturing defence equipment while commissioning INS Kolkata Indias largest indigenous built warship at the Naval Dockyard on Saturday

item.title: Dont count Eng marks in prelims Govt to UPSC
item.description: The Modi government on Saturday directed the Union Public Service Commission UPSC to not count marks for English comprehension skills in Paper II of the civil services preliminary examination
item.itunes:subtitle: The Modi government on Saturday directed the Union Public Service Commission UPSC to not count marks for English comprehension skills in Paper II of the civil services preliminary examination
item.itunes:summary: The Modi government on Saturday directed the Union Public Service Commission UPSC to not count marks for English comprehension skills in Paper II of the civil services preliminary examination

item.title: Yerawada may see first hanging of women in India
item.description: Renuka Kiran Shinde 41 and Seema Mohan Gavit 36 Two sisters on death row in Punes Yerawada Jail are likely to be hanged next month making them the first women to get the death penalty in India
item.itunes:subtitle: Renuka Kiran Shinde 41 and Seema Mohan Gavit 36 Two sisters on death row in Punes Yerawada Jail are likely to be hanged next month making them the first women to get the death penalty in India
item.itunes:summary: Renuka Kiran Shinde 41 and Seema Mohan Gavit 36 Two sisters on death row in Punes Yerawada Jail are likely to be hanged next month making them the first women to get the death penalty in India

item.title: Congress veteran Birender Singh joins BJP
item.description: Veteran Congress leader Birender Singh on Saturday formally joined the BJP in the presence of party national president Amit Shah at rally in Jind Singhs wife and Congress member Prem Lata also joined the saffron party as did 16 other Congress leaders including sitting Pundri MLA Sultan Singh

item.title: Students walk for peace in riot ravaged Muzaffarnagar
item.description: Thousands of students of madarsas and schools joined hands in Muzaffarnagar on the eve of Independence Day to resume the lost bond between two communities after last years fierce communal riot
item.itunes:subtitle: Thousands of students of madarsas and schools joined hands in Muzaffarnagar on the eve of Independence Day to resume the lost bond between two communities after last years fierce communal riot
item.itunes:summary: Thousands of students of madarsas and schools joined hands in Muzaffarnagar on the eve of Independence Day to resume the lost bond between two communities after last years fierce communal riot

item.title: Disciplining Young Turks could be the reason behind dropping Varun
item.description: BJP president Amit Shahs decision to drop Varun Gandhi from his new team announced on Saturday was apparently taken to reinforce discipline among party members especially young leaders
item.itunes:subtitle: BJP president Amit Shahs decision to drop Varun Gandhi from his new team announced on Saturday was apparently taken to reinforce discipline among party members especially young leaders
item.itunes:summary: BJP president Amit Shahs decision to drop Varun Gandhi from his new team announced on Saturday was apparently taken to reinforce discipline among party members especially young leaders
